item.name: Admin API
Tokens

request.description: Creates an ERC20 token owned and managed by project's backend account

Mints an ERC20 token

*   Token must be owned by project's backend account
*   toAddress is optional and when provided, then newly minted tokens will be transferred to that address
Burns an ERC20 token - Token must be owned by project's backend account
Transfers an ERC20 token - The "from" address must be owned by project's backend account
Get a list of tokens that belong to an `ownerAddress`

item.description: With Admin Tokens API, you can create a new ERC20 token, mint or burn it, and transfer it between your users' wallets

item.name: Wallets

request.description: Creates a custodial wallet owned by project's backend account

item.name: Get Latest Wallet by Phone Number

request.description: Get the last wallet created for the `phoneNumber` if exists

response.name: Successful response with latest wallet for phone number

item.name: Get All Wallets by Phone Number

request.description: Get all the wallets created for the `phoneNumber` is exist

response.name: Successful response with array of wallets

item.description: With Admin Wallet API, you can create new wallets for your users.
With Charge Admin API you can create and manage custodial wallets for your users to offer a Web2 like experience, as well as create, mint and burn tokens for your communities.

item.name: Jobs API

variable.description: (Required) The Id of the created job

request.description: Check the status of a job you created by jobId

variable.description: (Required) The Id of the created job

request.description: Check the status of a job you created by jobId

item.description: You can use the Jobs API to check the status of asyncronuous Admin API tasks that you have created.
